[60FPS (Hold Select button for 30FPS)]
D3000000 00000000
08003304 42700000
08003308 3F800000
DD000000 00000004
08003304 41F00000
08003308 40000000
D0000000 00000000
{Codes by @Hazerou}

[++FPS++]

[60FPS]
08003304 42700000
08003308 3F800000
{Codes by @Hazerou}

[Default 30FPS]
08003304 41F00000
08003308 40000000
{Codes by @Hazerou}
